name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Batman Gotham City Stormy Night Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into Gotham’s dark, stormy streets with this electrifying Batman live wallpaper! 🦇🌌

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace the shadows of Gotham City and witness Batman perched on a rooftop under a stormy sky, lightning illuminating his iconic silhouette. This Chrome live wallpaper captures the intense atmosphere of a rainy night in Gotham, with Batman watching over the city he’s sworn to protect. Perfect for fans of the Dark Knight, this extension combines brooding visuals with functional tools to bring Batman’s world to life in every new tab.

Key Features
🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Dive into Gotham City’s stormy night with a vivid, animated background of Batman.
🔗 Customizable Site Shortcuts: Quickly access favorite sites with editable shortcuts.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Search the web seamlessly from your Batman-themed tab.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Stay on track with a sleek clock and date feature in the tab.
🔗 Quick Access Links: Manage your extension with "Remove Extension" and "More Extensions" links located in the lower left corner.
Feel the thrill of Gotham’s stormy nights and Batman’s vigilant watch every time you open a new tab. This extension blends Gotham’s dark allure with essential tools, making it a must-have for fans who want to bring the Caped Crusader’s mysterious energy to their browser.

Keywords: Batman Gotham City Live Wallpaper, Dark Knight Chrome Extension, Gotham City Storm Theme, Batman Stormy Night Tab, Batman Chrome Wallpaper, Gotham Rain Wallpaper, Batman New Tab, DC Comics Live Wallpaper, Gotham Chrome Theme, Batman Vigilante Browser Theme
